content: stitch together with 1 gusset stitch 1 stitch de- creased turn proceed in this manner till all 5 gusset stitches have been absorbed from both sides of the heel you will have just completed a rs row leg re-join your self-striping yarn and begin working in the round knit till leg is about 2 5 cm 1 in less than desired length cuff and cast-off work 12 rounds of k1 p1 ribbing cast off using your favorite stretchy cast-off i use jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind-off weave in ends and enjoy www thecozyknitter com all images and text are copyright the cozy knitter 2015
